usage.cn: 生活有的时候很疯狂，我们追逐那些无法拥有的，却放弃那些我们最需要的
usage.eng: Life is crazy! We chase what we can't have, and run away from what we desire the most!

usage.cn: 身上事少自然苦少；口中言少自然祸少；腹中食少自然病少；心中欲少自然忧少。
usage.eng: Less matters less pain; less speech less offensiveness; less food less sickness; less desire less anxiety.

usage.cn: 每天早上睁开眼睛，看到你和阳光都在，这就是我想要的未来。
usage.eng: When I wake up every morning, the greatest joy is gazing upon you and sunshine, that is the future I desire.
